heading.title: Scale New Heights
heading.description: Engage the workplace with Certscope's custom learning solutions. Enhance your teams' skills in Data Science, IT, Project Management and more with Cerscope's Business Solutions.

trainings_heading.title: How can we help you scale?

Customised_trainings.title: Customised
Customised_trainings.description: Certscope provides corporate training in emerging technologies like IT, Project Management, Scrum and Agile Development, Digital Marketing, and more. Customised_trainings.details: Our training and consulting approach is calculative and results oriented with the main focus on organisational development. With our interactive learning platform, we offer learners a unique anytime/anywhere approach using our interactive online tools.

certificationData.title: Inspirit.
certificationData.description: Inspiration comes in many ways, often via people like you, who have the desire to spread knowledge. Assist mentees to learn new skills, advance their careers, and explore their passions by sharing your expertise.
certificationData.details: Be the fuel to the desire of learning.

paragraphs: The first step to getting started on the journey of becoming a part of CertScope Mentorship program is to create an account with us. You can get started with your account by visiting. If you already have an account continue to the next step.

paragraphs.note: Only registered and verified members of the community can apply for the program. You need to have created an account with CertScope to apply. To know more about accounts, visit

description.paragraph: After you have created an account with us, you will need to verify yourself and complete your account details. Once your account is verified, you can apply to become a part of our mentorship program.

paragraphs: After you apply for the mentorship program, we may ask you to submit proof and credentials based on the stream you have chosen to mentor. If requested you can either email or upload them for verification.

paragraphs.note: Please do not submit any certificates or documents, until and unless you are asked to do so. Do keep in mind, CertScope does not charge any fee for mentorship application, and/or it's processing.

paragraphs: Based on your educational and personal experiences and our assessment criteria, we will inform you via email about the outcome of your application. We consider many aspects of the applicant while deciding the outcome of the application. We value quality over quantity.

paragraphs.note: Note: Applying for the mentorship program does not qualify you for approval. If your application is refused, we may give you options to appeal against the decision. However, you may not be apply again for six months.

paragraphs: If your application was approved, you should start with what you are passionate about. Then organise your content, and pathway structure. You can use online documentation tools or even a piece of paper to create a wireframe of your content. Plan the pathway, and how you want the mentees to take that journey with you.
